entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
